productVariation: Slate aluminium bezel with black case and silicone band
shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

seo.title: Garmin vívoactive® 5 | Fitness Smartwatch with GPS
seo.ogDescription: The vívoactive 5 GPS smartwatch features an AMOLED touchscreen display, up to 11 days of battery life, detailed health insights, built-in sports apps & workouts.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Sleep Score and Insights
Battery life (smartwatch mode)Up to 11 days (5 days display always-on)
Pulse Ox blood oxygen saturation Yes (spot-check, and optionally all-day and in sleep)
Garmin Pay™
Music storage
Watch display typeAMOLED Optional Always-On Mode
Touchscreen
Water rating Swim, 5 ATM
Wheelchair mode

General
Strap materialSilicone
Lens MaterialCorning® Gorilla® Glass 3
Bezel MaterialAnodised aluminium
Case materialFiber-reinforced polymer
Quick Release bandsYes (20 mm, Industry standard)
Physical size42.2 x 42.2 x 11.1 mm
Fits wrists with a circumference of 125-190 mm
Weight26 g (36 g with included band)
Display Size30.4 mm (1.2") diameter
Display Resolution390 x 390 pixels
Colour display
Large font option
Battery lifeSmartwatch mode: Up to 11 days (5 days display always-on)
Battery Saver Smartwatch mode: Up to 21 days
GPS-Only GNSS mode: Up to 21 hours
All-Systems GNSS mode: Up to 17 hours
All-Systems GNSS mode with music: Up to 8 hours
See Details
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History4 GB

Time/date

Automatic daylight saving time

Stopwatch
Sunrise/sunset times

Wrist-based heart rate (constant, every second)
Daily resting heart rate
Abnormal heart rate alertsYes (high and low)
Respiration Rate (24x7)

All-day stress

SLEEP Yes (Advanced)

Calendar

Cycling Features
Alerts (triggers alarm when you reach goals including time, distance, heart rate or calories)
Compatible with Varia™ radar (rear-facing radar)
Compatible with Varia™ lights
Speed and cadence sensor support (w/sensor)Yes (using ANT+ or BLE)

Swimming Features
Open-water swim metrics (distance, pace, stroke count/rate, stroke distance, swim efficiency (SWOLF), calories)
Pool swim metrics (lengths, distance, pace, stroke count, swim efficiency (SWOLF), calories)
Stroke type detection (freestyle, backstroke, breaststroke, butterfly) (pool swim only)
Basic rest timer (up from 0) (pool swim only)
Auto rest (pool swim only)
Time and distance alerts
Underwater wrist-based heart rate
